content: get ready to make a splash with our crochet patrick star characters whether you re a spongebob squarepants fan or just love adorable amigurumi this free crochet pattern is perfect for you dive into creativity and bring patrick to life with our step-by-step instructions scroll down to start crafting your own patrick star today **materials** - milk cotton yarn 2 5mm - crochet hook 2 75 3mm - fiberfill sewing needle scissors **permitted use** you can sell items made from these patterns/tutorial videos a small quantity of fewer than 50 products/month provided that they are handmade by yourself and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling ** pattern by amivui studio ** https //amivuistudio com/ i would love to see your ﬁnished doll so please share the picture with me tag me @amivuistudio and use the hashtags #amivuistudio and #amivui on instagram let us know if you have a specific question or give an idea of what you re looking for we re happy to make recommendations **check out our other products** https //shop amiguworld com/ 1 **contact** contact us via email amivuistudio@gmail com ⁠ᵔ⁠ᴥ⁠ᵔ⁠ 1 https //shop amiguworld com/
